name: A different planet
description:
A different planet is my first game to be uploaded to the internet. It was created in my spare time during two weeks for the Beginners Circle Jam #3.

The goal of the game is to find a different planet in a galaxy filled with boredom and contempt.

On each level you must visit all the planets to open the gate to the next sector, while accounting for the gravity of the different celestial bodies.

Your ship has a limited supply of fuel and oxygen. Most planets contain fuel and all of them contain oxygen, this is indicated by the red and blue symbols respectively.

Controls:

  • Accelerate : space bar
  • Rotate : A/D or left/right arrow
  • Zoom : mouse wheel or Q/E
  • Pause : escape  

All code an assets were made by me except:

  • Music: 
    • To The Great Beyond by Stellardrone
    • Billions And Billions by Stellardrone
    • Eternity by Stellardrone
  • Sound effects:
    • https://freesound.org/
  • Font: 
    • Sakbunderan by tripujiyanto
